channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Co-Term MS in Econ Program: Virtual Info Session on October 1
item.description: Join us from 4:30pm-5:00pm virtually on October 1 to learn how our STEM-Designated MS in Economics can help you advance your career. We’ll discuss the program structure, funding, and application process. Registration is required.
item.author: Students

item.title: CCPD & Unity House of Troy Info Session | Sept. 30
item.description: The CCPD will be hosting an info session with Unity House of Troy on Tuesday, September 30th! If you’re interested in helping those in need and seeing the resilience of a community in action, Unity House offer opportunities in the form of employment, volunteer roles, and internships. Come learn more about available opportunities and the valuable work that Unity House does for the community! Registration and details are available in Handshake.

item.title: DOSO Day 9/25
item.description: Come meet the Dean of Students Office Staff while enjoying some activities, snack foods, and ice cream for the first 100 guests! This event is open to the RPI student body on Thursday, 9/25 from 2-4pm located at Off-Campus Commons (1525 15th street). We look forward to seeing you there.

item.title: Order of the Engineer Registration | Sept. 25
item.description: Date: Thursday, September 25, 2025 9:00 AM - 4:00 PM - The Order of the Engineer is open to all senior and graduate engineering students. The Order is a national organization that fosters a spirit of pride and responsibility in the engineering profession. The ceremony will be held October 15th at 6:00 PM. You must attend to be inducted and receive your ring. Registration and sizing ends Friday, September 26th. To register:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSey…

item.title: Cable Television Outage in Specific Campus Buildings
item.description: Multimedia Services would like to inform the campus about an issue affecting CATV services in several buildings: Sage, Troy, Ricketts, and 87Gym. Our service provider has identified the issue–an underground cable–and will implement repairs as soon as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate patience as we work toward a resolution. New information will be provided as soon as it becomes available. Thank you for your understanding.

item.description: Date: Wednesday, October 1, 2025 3:00 PM - 4:30 PM - President Martin A. Schmidt ’81, Ph.D., invites you to attend the Fall Town Meeting on Wednesday, October 1, at 3 p.m. in the Curtis R. Priem Experimental Media and Performing Arts Center (EMPAC) theater.

item.title: SoE Fall 2025 Midterm Course Surveys: Adding Additional Questions to a Course Section (Instructor Training) | Sept. 29
item.description: Date: Monday, September 29, 2025 1:30 PM - 2:00 PM - Learn how to add additional questions to your School of Engineering Midterm. The institute has standard defined questions for the SoE midterm, but if you wanted to add a few questions on top of what is already defined this training is for you. Please click the link in the See section to register.

item.title: Interested in learning more about the Testing Center? | Sept. 29
item.description:
Date: Monday, September 29, 2025 (all day) - The Testing Center supports students with declared accommodations as well as student-athletes with exam scheduling conflicts. We provide a distraction-reduced environment to help ensure academic success. Visit the Provost’s Website, https://provost.rpi.edu/faculty-resources/testing-center, to learn more.
